gym_mushi_040_receptionist_00:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Welcome to the Cortondo Gym,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].
gym_mushi_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Katy,
the Sugarbug?
gym_mushi_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_mushi_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_mushi_040_mushi_entry_01: Eat up, my cute little Vivillon![VAR 0114(002C)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_01: Oh? What a lovely Trainer you are.[VAR 0114(002C)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_02:
Thank you very much for your skillful olive rolling.
It was quite impressive.[VAR 0114(002C)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_03:
Oh? Did I forget to introduce myself?
Forgive me.[VAR 0114(002C)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_04:
My name is Katy, and I am the owner here at
Patisserie Soapberry.[VAR 0114(002C)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_05:
Oh? That’s right, I’m not in my shop—I’m on duty
as leader of the Cortondo Gym right now![VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_06:
Forgive me. Ahem. My name is Katy, and I am
the Gym Leader here in Cortondo.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_07:
My main line of work is crafting sweets as a
pastry chef.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_08:
Little sweets that bring happiness with just one
bite, Bug-type Pokémon hiding in foliage...\r
Both are small and yet very powerful.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_09:
Don’t let your guard down unless you would like
to find yourself knocked off your feet![VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_10:
Your strength rose during our battle like a nice
bread in the oven.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_11:
I feel that I may need to work on my own
strength as well![VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_12:
Congratulations! You passed! As proof of your
victory against me—the Gym Leader—allow me\r
to present you with this Gym Badge.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_16:
I hope you’ll enjoy it alongside a heaping serving
of some of my deluxe handmade treats![VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_badge:
With [VAR NUM1(0001)] Gym Badge[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s in your possession, Pokémon
of up to Lv. [VAR NUM2(0002)] will be easier to catch and will\r
listen to your commands as well.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_badge_all:
With 8 Gym Badges in your possession, you will
be able to catch Pokémon of any level. They will\r
all certainly listen to your commands as well.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_waza:
I see you have quite the appetite as well! How
about a little TM as the frosting on this cake?[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_13:
Once you’ve found a TM during your travels,
you can then use a TM Machine to make copies\r
of that TM. You did know that, right?[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_14:
I wish you luck in your future adventures. May
they be as sweet and lovely as a good dessert.[VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_mushi_15: Off you go, then. Until we meet again![VAR 0114(0016)]
gym_mushi_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Cortondo Gym!
